text: Could it be possible to create an URL redirect that points to the landing page and also strips all parameters away from the link and that way removes the relation to the original recipient? I havenâ€™t try this but it could work.

Not sure if you can mess with HS internals that way but maybe, my problem is anyway that people tend to type whatever they want in e-mail fields and I want that field populated but keep the users grubby hands off the input, then they'd probably go into panic when they can't type in an e-mail address and whatnot, but luckily this problem has been buried for the time being :crossed_fingers:

Hi, hope I get you right. How about setting up a transactional email, use custom properties and use the API to trigger the email?

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/marketing/transactional-emails>
